pages.text: This butterfly can only be found in the $(#1288ff)swamps$(). A player can lure the swamphopper towards them by holding a $(#1288ff)blue orchid$(). When put into a bottle, the swamphopper will $(#1288ff)pickup nearby items and deposit it into any inventory below it$()
pages.title: Painted Panther

pages.wings_caption: The wings of the Swamphopper can be converted to $(#1288ff)lapis lazuli$()
pages.butterfly_caption: The blue wing color gives the swamphopper $(#1288ff)camouflage$() over the watery surfaces
